column6:
As armor-piercing destruction bears down on Iron Man at eight times the speed of sound, the high-tech secret at the heart of Tony Stark's latest reinvention of his powered suit is finally revealed... and still another set of mysterious enemies, far faster and deadlier than even the new and improved Iron Man, are likewise closing in for the cybernetic kill!,2007,2
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller:Brian Denham | letterer:Dave Lanphear | penciller (cover):Adam Warren
